outline:
1. to be contentious, be rebellious, be refractory, be disobedient towards, be rebellious against
    1. (Qal) to be disobedient, be rebellious
      1. towards father
      2. towards God
    2. (Hiphil) to show rebelliousness, show disobedience, disobey
kjv_def: bitter, change, be disobedient, disobey, grievously, provocation, provoke(-ing), (be) rebel (against, -lious).
strongs_def: to be (causatively, make) bitter (or unpleasant); (figuratively) to rebel (or resist; causatively, to provoke)
